body:
Hi Tim


Static; meaning not moving at varying hourly intervals.  The blinds (as components) are set at wherever you put them; be it always up, always down or always somewhere in between. 


If you want to see more, please join the web-demo, see the info previously provided. 


Thanks
Liam
